FuncDef:
The access-service command creates an access service template or displays the view of an access service template. If an access service template exists, the access service template view will be displayed after you run this command.
The undo access-service command removes an access service template.
By default, no access service template is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an access service template.
The name is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the RADIUS server sends a name of an access service template to implement the QoS function, you can run the access-service command to create an access service template.
Precautions
An access service template being used by an online user cannot be removed.
If the access service name sent by the RADIUS server does not exist, the user fails to be authenticated and cannot get online.
